p: Epicoprostanol, 5β-cholestan-3α-ol, heptane (99%), anhydride pyridine (99.9%), and N, O-bis(trimethylsilyl)trifluoroacetamide (BSTFA) (99.9%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). HPLC-grade n-hexane, HPLC-grade methanol, potassium hydroxide (85%) (KOH), acetone, and HPLC-grade dichloromethane were purchased from Thermo Fisher (Waltham, MA, USA).
